Welcome to [APP NAME]!

This app allows you to visualize the the impacts of Grand River Transit's upcoming ION Rapid Transit lines. You can compare travel routes, service areas, and access to points of interest using:
  1.  The Region of Waterloo's existing road network
  2. The existing Grand River Transit bus network, and
  3. The existing Grand River Transit bus network with ION included
    (Phase 1: Kitchener—Waterloo Light Rail + Cambridge Bus Rapid Transit).

NOTE: As the schedule for the ION Rapid Transit network has not yet been released, this application only provides simulated results for the ION network based on a hypothetical schedule we created ourselves (see our Github page for assumptions). The application serves to demonstrate how these transit changes could be visualized and demonstrated to the public, and therefore should not currently be relied upon for accurate ION routing. By using this application, you acknowledge that you use all routes and analysis layers created by the application, regardless of the transportation network, at your own risk.
